About Me

I'm Abhinav Merugu, a Software Engineer with a passion for web and mobile application development. With 3 years of experience in the field, I am currently pursuing my Masters in Computer Science at CSU Chico and have a GPA of 3.7.

My expertise lies in web development, where I have strong knowledge of React, TypeScript, JavaScript, C++, Python, Redux, GatsbyJS, NextJS, Django, REST APIs, ExpressJS, Astro, Jest unit testing, and more. I'm also experienced in mobile application development and have knowledge in Machine Learning.

My attention to detail and focus on UX and UI design are integral to my work, and I strive to create products that are both beautiful and functional. I'm a quick learner, adaptable, and am always looking for opportunities to grow and improve my skill set. I have earned over 6 certifications from Interaction Design Foundation, which highlights my dedication to learning and staying on top of the latest industry trends.
